subject: Re: FW: Discount change request
preview: Hi Anita, Thanks for your time just now. As discussed, when the user enters their coupon code, they are already on the Aventus app/platform. This is outside of our control as we only manage the WordP

full_threads.body:
Hi Anita, 

Thanks for your time just now. As discussed, when the user enters their coupon code, they are already on the Aventus app/platform. This is outside of our control as we only manage the WordPress website. 

Hope this clarifies?

attachments.filename: Are Media EDM 2 Promotion mechanics & Terms and conditions_Final.pdf

full_threads.body: Done! Will send an invite now.

Hi Heath,

Sounds good - Tuesday?

I'm free around 2 if that suits.

Thanks
Anita

Get Outlook for iOS

Hi Anita, 

Yes, can we please arrange for a call on this. I would need to know: 

1. How the user is being directed to the checkout (so we know which campaign they are apart of) 
2. What messaging you would like to show
@heath Can you help me with this one?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,


We have a new campaign launching on the 6th October where a discount code will be put into the check out and give $100 off the base premium.


We wanted to see if it's possible to add a message when the promo code is validated.


Do you know if this is something you are able to help with using Optimize or similar? I've left the trail of discussion with Aventus below so you have some context.


Let me know if it's easier to jump on a call to talk through.


Thanks
Anita


Anita Manchester

Head of Marketing

m 0404 968 482

w stellainsurance.com.au


From: Renee Cosgrave <Renee@stellainsurance.com.au>
Sent: Thursday, 30 September 2021 4:50 PM
To: Anita Manchester <anita@stellainsurance.com.au>
Subject: FW: Discount change request


Just putting this back on your radar.


From: David Barnes - Aventus <david@aventusplatform.com>
Sent: Friday, 24 September 2021 3:55 PM
To: Renee Cosgrave <Renee@stellainsurance.com.au>
Cc: Adam Larke <adam@aventusplatform.com>; Anita Manchester <anita@stellainsurance.com.au>; Derek Polley <derek.polley@aventusplatform.com>
Subject: Re: Discount change request


Hi Renee,

Yes this is something that you could ask WP Perk could do by using GTM / Optimizely, similar to the way that you alter the phone number for CTM.

Thanks

David

On Fri, 24 Sep 2021 at 01:43, Renee Cosgrave <Renee@stellainsurance.com.au> wrote:

Can we do this using optimize?

@David given this is in symphony is this something your team can do or would you prefer us to engage WP Perk to do this?

From: Anita Manchester <anita@stellainsurance.com.au>
Sent: Friday, 24 September 2021 9:10 AM
To: David Barnes - Aventus <david@aventusplatform.com>
Cc: Renee Cosgrave <Renee@stellainsurance.com.au>; Adam Larke <adam@aventusplatform.com>; Derek Polley <derek.polley@aventusplatform.com>
Subject: RE: Discount change request

Hi David,

No problem on the limit 2000 is fine.

Thanks for sharing the screenshot for reference. In terms of the message showing - is it not possible to add one?

Thanks,
Anita

Anita Manchester

Head of Marketing

m 0404 968 482

w stellainsurance.com.au

From: David Barnes - Aventus <david@aventusplatform.com>
Sent: Friday, 24 September 2021 8:55 AM
To: Anita Manchester <anita@stellainsurance.com.au>
Cc: Renee Cosgrave <Renee@stellainsurance.com.au>; Adam Larke <adam@aventusplatform.com>; Derek Polley <derek.polley@aventusplatform.com>
Subject: Re: Discount change request

Hi Anita,

We need to set a limit in the back end (a required field). I'll request it to be set to 2000 for now and can always adjust it upwards if it goes bonkers!

The platform can only take one discount at a time so you couldn't use both, it would be one or another, so should be fine there for the BC campaign launching.

Just on the pdf there was this part - Message to validate coupon working: Your code has been accepted. You'll receive an email with your e gift card details soon. Just to confirm that when the code is successfully applied in checkout the code will show as attached (screenshot from previous campaign) but no additional messages will be shown.

Best Regards,

David

David Barnes
Chief Operating and Customer Officer
Aventus Platform

M: 07515 771 343

W: www.aventusplatform.com

That's ok there doesn't need to be a cap.

One thing we need to include is that only one coupon code validates at any given time as there will be a cross over of the Business Chicks and Are Media promotions in timing.

Thanks

Anita

Hi Renee,

As discussed this morning I have attached the balsamiq - https://balsamiq.cloud/svh7akc/phb0gid/rA906 of what can be supported for the Business Chicks campaign with regards to the messaging for the fixed discounts and I have also attached the breakdown that outlined the way the discount would be applied including the example of if an MTA took the policy under the original minimum value that was set up on the discount code, resulting in Stella having to fund the difference for QBE.

.

Let us know if you want to proceed with this approach and we would need the code details asap. I would still suggest a 5th Launch to allow for full testing and set up,

On that note, we need the final details of the Are Media discount code by today to set this up. Is the launch still on Monday?

Any questions, just shout.

Best Regards,

David

I'll have to get the team to look at the planning, changes and testing to see if it's possible to meet the deadline and the extra days maybe key.

With regards to the current e-gift card campaign for the 27th. Can we get those details ASAP so we can get that set up.

Thanks

David

On Mon, 20 Sep 2021 at 08:34, Renee Cosgrave <Renee@stellainsurance.com.au> wrote:

Hi David,

See below from our legal counsel. Unfortunately we cannot proceed with example 1 and that as discussed on the call last Thursday in order to apply a discount at checkout it needs to apply to the base premium as per example 2.

As mentioned on Friday for the Are Media campaign on the 27th September we have opted to go with a eGift card given the tight timeframes, however are extremely keen to go down this root for the Business Chicks campaign which we've scheduled to kick off on 1st October. We can stretch this to 5th October if you can make the changes to the way the discount is applied as per the below advice?

Please let me know asap so we can make any changes accordingly should you not be able to implement the change before this date?

Thanks,
Renee

From: Marianne Robinson <Marianne.Robinson@sparke.com.au>
Sent: Sunday, 19 September 2021 4:34 PM
To: Renee Cosgrave <Renee@stellainsurance.com.au>
Subject: RE: Changes to FSG and admin disclosures [SPARKE-MATT.FID5177758]

Hi Renee

Discounts are usually applied to the premium before any stamp duty and ESL is applied and of course does not apply to the admin fee.

For the purposes of the NSW Stamp duty the premium is defined in Section 231 as the total consideration given to an insurer by or on behalf of the insured to effect insurance without deductions for any amounts paid or payable, or allowed or allowable, by way of commission or discount to an insurance intermediary.

Premium includes a fire service levy and emergency service levy paid or payable in connection with insurance by an insurer or any other person and it does not include an amount paid to an insurance intermediary by the insured person as a fee, provided that the amount can be clearly identified as a fee, or an amount of duty under this or a corresponding Act.

So you discount the premium then calculate the levies and the stamp duty.

You need to add a bit under a heading 'Discounts' that says something like :

'The Business Chicks Discount is only available to new policyholders for the first period of insurance'

Marianne Robinson | Special Counsel | Corporate & Commercial
Sparke Helmore Lawyers | Level 29, 25 Martin Place, Sydney NSW 2000
t: +61 2 9260 2755 | f: +61 2 9373 3599

David
